heroTitle1: Rediscover What's Lost, Restore What's Valued
heroSubtitle: The modern platform to help you find your lost items and connect honest finders with owners.
feature1Desc: Search through a vast database of lost and found items across various locations.
feature2Desc: Quickly report a lost or found item with our simple, guided form.
feature3Desc: Efficiently manage found items at your establishment and improve customer service.
successQuote: I lost my favorite headphones at the airport. Thanks to FindItNow, I was contacted by the staff within hours and got them back the next day!
downloadSubtitle: Find what you've lost, right from your pocket.
faqLink1: How do I report a lost item?
faqLink2: What happens after I report a found item?
faqLink4: How can my business become a partner?
testimonialsSubtitle: Real stories of reunited items and restored happiness.
aboutSubtitle: We connect people with their lost items through technology and community.
aboutMissionDesc: Our mission is to create a centralized, trustworthy platform that simplifies the process of recovering lost belongings. We believe that every item has a story and every owner deserves a happy ending. By leveraging technology and community, we aim to transform the anxiety and stress of losing items into an experience of hope and relief.
aboutValues1Desc: We foster a community of honesty and transparency.
aboutValues2Desc: We understand the sentimental value of your items.
aboutValues3Desc: We constantly improve our technology to make finding easier.
aboutJoinDesc: Become a part of our growing community. Report a found item, help someone in need, or partner with us.
servicesSubtitle: Tailored solutions for individuals and businesses.
servicesIndividualDesc: A free and easy way to find your lost items.
servicesBusinessDesc: Enhance customer service and operational efficiency.
servicesReadyDesc: Join FindItNow today and start making a difference.
hiwSubtitle: Reuniting you with your lost items in four simple steps.
hiwStep1Desc: Browse our database for your lost item.
hiwStep2Desc: Provide details of your lost or found item.
hiwStep3Desc: Receive alerts when a potential match is found.
hiwStep4Desc: Connect to get your item back.
faq1Title: How do I report a lost or found item?
faq1Content: Simply click 'I've Lost Something' or 'I've Found Something' on the homepage and fill out the form with as much detail as possible, including the category, description, location, and date.
faq2Content: Yes, FindItNow is completely free for individuals reporting or searching for lost items. We also offer premium plans for businesses that need advanced features for managing found property.
faq3Title: How is my personal information protected?
faq3Content: We take your privacy seriously. Your contact details are only shared with your consent to communicate with a finder or claimant. All communication can be done securely through our platform.
faq4Title: What should I do if I think I've found my item listed?
faq4Content: If you find an item you believe is yours, click on the listing and use the 'Claim Ownership' button. You will be asked to provide proof of ownership to ensure the item is returned to its rightful owner.
faq5Title: How can my business become a FindItNow partner?
faq5Content: We welcome partners! Businesses like hotels, airports, and malls can sign up through our 'For Business' page. This gives you access to a dashboard to easily manage found items and improve customer satisfaction.
faq6Title: What kind of items can I report?
faq6Content: You can report any type of personal item, from electronics and wallets to jewelry and documents. The more detailed your description, the higher the chance of a successful reunion.
browseSubtitle: Explore the latest reported lost and found items.
browseNoItemsDesc: No items were found matching your criteria. Try expanding your search.
browseItemNotFoundDesc: The item you requested could not be found. It may have been removed or the URL is incorrect.
reportFormLostDesc: Provide the details of your lost item to notify our community.
reportFormFoundDesc: Thank you for taking the time to report a found item. Please provide the details below.
reportFormEditDesc: Update the details of your reported item.
reportFormDescPlaceholder: Provide a detailed description of the item, including its color, brand, size, or any other distinguishing features.
reportFormLocationPlaceholder: e.g., Central Park, near the fountain
reportFormContactEmailDescNew: We will send a one-time verification email. You won't have to verify again for subsequent reports.
reportFormContactEmailDescAuth: You are logged in. This is your registered account email.
reportFormImageDescNew: Upload up to 5 images. The first image will be the main one.
reportFormImageDescExisting: Add new images to your gallery. Replacing the main image is not currently supported.
itemResolvedDesc: This item has been marked as returned to its owner.
isThisYourItemDesc: If you believe this is your lost item, submit a claim to contact the owner and start the return process.
cannotClaimOwnItem: You cannot claim your own reported item.
haveYouFoundThisDesc: If you have found this lost item, notify the owner by filling out the form below. You'll be helping make someone's day!
claimFormProofPlaceholder: Please describe the item in detail to prove you are the owner. Include specific features only you would know, like a scratch, the contents of a wallet, a specific keychain, or a wallpaper on a phone.
claimFormProofImageDesc: Upload an image that helps prove your ownership (e.g., a photo of you with the item, a receipt).
validation.subjectMin: Subject must be at least 5 characters.
validation.messageMin: Message must be at least 10 characters.
validation.itemNameMin: Item name must be at least 3 characters.
validation.descriptionMin: Description must be at least 10 characters.
validation.locationMin: Location must be at least 3 characters.
validation.imageRequired: At least one image is required.
validation.storyMin: Story must be at least 10 characters.
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters.
contactSubtitle: Have a question or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
contactFormDesc: Fill out the form and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
contactToastSuccessDesc: Thanks for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.
contactToastErrorDesc: Could not send your message. Please try again later.
contactInfoDesc: Get in touch with us through the channels below.
privacyIntroContent: Welcome to FindItNow. We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.
privacyInfoCollectContent1: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, and details about the items you report.
privacyInfoCollectContent2: We also collect information automatically when you use our service, such as your IP address and browser information.
privacyInfoUseContent: We use your information to provide and improve our service, to communicate with you, and to keep our platform secure. Your name and email are only shared with other users with your explicit consent to facilitate the return of an item.
privacyInfoShareContent: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with service providers who assist us in operating our service.
privacyInfoKeepContent: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and to comply with our legal obligations.
privacyInfoSafeContent: We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access or disclosure.
privacyMinorsContent: Our service is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
privacyRightsContent: You have the right to access, correct, or delete the information we hold about you. Please contact us to exercise these rights.
termsAgreementContent: By using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the service.
termsServiceDescContent: FindItNow provides a platform for users to report and search for lost and found items. We are facilitators and are not involved in the actual exchange of items. We do not guarantee the return of any item.
termsUserConductContent: You agree not to use the service to post any false, misleading, illegal, harassing, or otherwise objectionable content. You are solely responsible for your interactions with other users. We encourage you to use caution and good judgment.
termsDisclaimersContent: The service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. FindItNow disclaims all warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
termsLiabilityContent: In no event shall FindItNow be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages, including but not limited to, damages for loss of property, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses.
termsGoverningLawContent: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which the company is registered, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
footerReuniting: Reuniting what's lost, restoring what's valued.
signupSubtitle: Enter your email below to create your account.
loginSubtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account.
forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a code to reset your password.
partnerRegisterSubtitle: Register your business to easily manage found items and connect with owners.
partnerRecentItemsDesc: Here is a list of the last 5 items you reported.
partnerEnquiriesSubtitle: Review and respond to enquiries about the items you have reported.
enquiriesSubtitle: Manage incoming enquiries for your reported items.
enquiriesNoEnquiriesDesc: You do not have any open enquiries on your items currently.
partnerEnquiriesNoEnquiriesDesc: You do not have any open enquiries currently.
toastClaimAcceptedDesc: You can now communicate with the claimant via the secure chat.
toastEnquiryResolvingDesc: Waiting for confirmation from the claimant.
accountSubtitle: Manage your profile information and submissions.
accountNoSubmissionsDesc: You have not reported any lost or found items yet.
accountNoClaimsDesc: You have not made any claims for items yet.
accountAcceptResolutionPrompt: The owner has marked the item as handed over to you. Please confirm to close the deal.
accountDealClosed: Deal closed! The item is now marked as 'resolved'.
accountDeleteItemDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your item listing.
chatNotFoundDesc: The chat you requested could not be found, or you do not have permission to view it.
chatDealClosedDesc: This item has been successfully reunited. The chat is now disabled.
chatDisabledPlaceholder: Chat is disabled for this resolved item
toastClaimSubmittedDesc: Your claim has been sent to the item's owner.
feedbackDesc: We're glad you were reunited with your {{itemName}}! Please take a moment to rate your experience.
feedbackDefaultStory: I was so relieved to find my {{itemName}}!
feedbackToastSuccessDesc: Your story helps others keep hope.
toastAccountSuspendedDesc: This account has been temporarily suspended.
suspendedDesc: Your account has been suspended due to a violation of our terms of service.
suspendedReason: For more information, or to appeal this decision, please contact support.
